about_the_game:
Welcome to a brand new Approachable Sudoku adventure!

Cracking the Cryptic Approachable Sudoku features 30 puzzles at launch with 20 more coming as free updates. With puzzles created by Cane_Puzzles, Florian Wortmann, Wessel Strijkstra and Mr. Menace, you can expect the quality puzzles we are known for. CTC Approachable Sudoku features a large number of different variants with each puzzle designed to highlight a particular aspect of those variants. Puzzles are designed for all skill levels. Enjoy!
